text: Sphingomonas pseudosanguinis is a bacterium from the genus of Sphingomonas, which has been isolated from a humidifier in Germany.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas pseudosanguinis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase pseudosanguinis Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Sphingomonas pseudosanguinis
